626:1: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat -uttrasiṣyanti bhagavan asminnirdeśe adhimānikā nimittacāriṇa iti |
626:10: adhimānaprajñayā niradhimānatāṃ gaveṣante mānaprahāṇaṃ ca gaveṣante |
626:11: ye punarāyuṣmānnānanda mānaṃ nopalabhante na samanupaśyanti na manyante nābhiniviśante,
626:14: na ca āyuṣmānnānanda adhimānikānāmarthāya iyaṃ dharmadeśanā pravṛttā |
626:22: ye punarāyuṣmannānanda nāpi samamupalabhante na viṣamam,
626:25: na te kvaciduttrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsamāpatsyante ||
626:29: ye ca pratyekabuddhayānīyā gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu caranti,
626:37: ye punarāyuṣmannānanda bodhisattvā nimittāpagatā animittacāriṇo'nānātvacāriṇo gambhīreṣu dharmeṣvatyantameva niryātāḥ,
626:41: teṣāmeṣu evaṃrūpeṣu dharmeṣu na dhandhāyitatvaṃ na kāṅkṣāyitatvam |
626:43: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi te'nulomaṃ sthitāḥ, na vilomam |
626:51: na hi ānanda hīnādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāmudāreṣu dharmeṣu buddhadharmeṣu cittaṃ krāmati |
626:55: śuddheyamānanda parṣat pūrvajinakṛtādhikārā avaropitakuśalamūlā bahubuddhaparyupāsitā gambhīradharmādhimuktikā gambhīradharmacaritā |
626:56: viśvasto hi ānanda tathāgato'syāṃ parṣadi prasahya dharmaṃ deśayati,
626:63: tadyathāpi nāma ānanda yadā anavatapto nāgarājaḥ pramudito bhavati prītisaumanasyajātaḥ,
626:67: te'pi pramuditāḥ sveṣu sveṣu bhavaneṣu pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitāḥ samanvaṅgībhūtāḥ krīḍanto mahāvṛṣṭimutsṛjanti,
626:68: evameva ānanda tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya mahādharmavṛṣṭimutsṛjato ya ime jyeṣṭhaputrā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
626:69: te'pi iha lokadhātau svakasvakāni ca buddhakṣetrāṇi gatvā imaṃ dharmasamudayamārabhya teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ purastānmahādharmavṛṣṭimutsṛjanti,
626:71: tadyathāpi nāma ānanda sāgaro nāgarājo yadā pramudito bhavati,
626:73: ye ca tatra bhavane naivāsikā nāgā bhavanti,
626:76: tābhiśca te varṣadhārābhiḥ sukhaṃ ca saṃjānante |
626:81: asahyā hi ānanda tā varṣadhārā anyairnāgaiḥ |
626:85: ye ca tathāgatasya jyeṣṭhaputrā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kṛtakuśalamūlā udārāśayā gambhīradharmanayanirjātāḥ,
626:87: śrutvā udagrāḥ prītāḥ praharṣitāḥ sukhaṃ saṃjānante |
626:88: idamānanda tathāgato'rthavaśaṃ saṃpratītya śuddhāyāṃ parṣadi mahāsiṃhanādaṃ nadati,
626:94: te khalu evaṃ saṃvibhaktāstasya rājñaścakravartino'ntike bhūyasyā mātrayā adhikaṃ prema ca prasādaṃ ca saṃjanayeyuḥ,
626:96: evameva ānanda tathāgato'pi dharmarājā dharmasvāmī svayaṃbhūrimān putrān saṃnipātya imaṃ dharmaratnagañjaṃ saṃvibhajati ebhyaḥ putrebhyaḥ,
626:98: te mamāntike bhūyasyā mātrayā prema ca prasādaṃ ca gauravaṃ cotpādayanti,
626:100: na śakyamānanda anyaiḥ sattvairidaṃ dharmaratnaṃ hīnādhimuktikairadhimānikairdṛṣṭicaritairnimittacaritairupalambhadṛṣṭicaritairasmimānahatai rāgadveṣamohābhibhūtairutpathaprayātaiḥ |
626:101: na hi ānanda hīnādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ cakravartidhanaṃ rocate |
626:104: kimānanda daridrasattvānāṃ cakraratnena vā hastiratnena vā aśvaratnena vā maṇiratnena vā strīratnena vā gṛhapatiratnena vā pariṇāyakaratnena vā udārairvā vastraiḥ,
626:106: yāni labdhvāpi prītā na śaknuvanti paribhoktum |
626:110: nāpyānanda daridrasattvā ratnānyapi prajānanti - asya ratnasyedaṃ nāmeti |
626:111: evameva ānanda ye tathāgatasya putrā dṛṣṭasatyā bodhisattvāśca mahāsattvāḥ,
626:115: kimānanda daridrasattvāḥ śrutavihīnāḥ śrutavipratipannā bālā acakṣuṣmantaḥ anena dharmaratnakośena kariṣyanti ?
626:116: labdhvā cojjhiṣyanti anyebhyo'pi vā dātavyaṃ maṃsyante |
626:117: na hi ānanda caṇḍālā vā pukkasā vā veṇukārā vā,
626:118: ye vā kecidanye daridrajīvinaḥ sattvāḥ udāraṃ ratnaṃ labdhvā svayaṃ paribhuñjate |
626:119: te samardhaṃ vā vikrīṇanti ujjhanti vā |
626:122: daridrasattvā ityānanda sarvabālapṛthagjanānāmetadadhivacanaṃ dṛṣṭipaṅkanimagnānāmaupalambhikānāṃ bandhābhiniviṣṭānāṃ nimittacaritānāmutpathaprayātānām,
626:123: ye khalu ānanda idaṃ dharmaratnaṃ labdhvā na śaknuvanti paribhoktum,
626:131: na hi ānanda śṛgālaḥ siṃhanādaṃ paribhuṅkte |
626:137: ye punarānanda samyaksaṃbuddhasya potakāḥ mahābuddhasiṃhena svayaṃ bhuñjānenotpāditāḥ,
626:140: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat-āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvatpariśuddheyaṃ tathāgatasya parṣat saṃnipatitā |
626:143: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat-guṇāṃstvaṃ śāradvatīputra parṣadaḥ parikīrtayasi |
626:144: āha-na hyasyā bhagavan parṣado mayā śakyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum |
626:148: na hyasyāḥ parṣado guṇānāmantaḥ śakyo'dhigantuṃ samyaksaṃbuddhairapi,
626:152: svenaiva kuśalamūlena iyaṃ mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā parṣat saṃnipatitā |
626:156: avaśyaṃ hi evaṃrūpāyāṃ dharmadeśanāyāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ saṃnipāto bhavati |
626:157: ye'pyanye śāradvatīputra buddhā bhagavantaḥ imaṃ sarvasaṃśayocchedanaṃ bodhisattvapiṭakaṃ saṃprakāśayiṣyanti,
